summary: This adds a Standalone light Armor Set to the game. The parts are different retextured Items from the Vanilla game.
descriptionHtml:
English Translation
--------------------------

Now you can choose between an English and a German Version. Both are listes under Update files, since they\'re both the actual 1.3 files with the working world models as already mentioned before^^


(V1.3) Alternate HD textures and working inventory models!
-----------

Finally with the release of the Creation Kit, it was possible to make working gnd files, so now the right model with fitting texture is shown in your inventory or in the world.

Also, with the new HD textures from Bethesda it was possible to make HD textures for this mod.
BUT: Because I had no HD texture of the Scalemail, I made a new one, made from Metal, so it will change the look of the armor a little. If you liked the older more, you can keep it, maybe I will make a HD version of it.    ---> look pictures for changes

The new ESP with world models and the new textures are different WinRar Archives so you can download both or just one of them.

V1.2
--------

Now with this new version, you get the entire set working with female characters! As seen in the pictures, Lydia is very satisfied with the result!
Of course, both genders can be used with beast races. Also with 1.2, there comes an alternative hood, made from chainmail, as also can be seen in the picture.

So now you have the complete set working with both genders, so you can enjoy, and you can choose between 3 different types of head gear, or you can
ignore it, whatever ;)

Still, I have no working gnd models, so this will be my task for next version!

Enjoy!


V1.1
-----

\"I agree with the others, add a hood and its all good\"

\"maybe a hood would be cool\"

\"I think a hood would be a nice option, but I don\'t mind the helm. \"

So with this new version, you get, what you demanded: A hood made from the same dark stuff as some parts of the cuirass.
It\'s compatible with the beast races.
And for the ones, who appreciated the helmet, it was made fully compatible with the beast races, too.
If some of this doesn\'t work, feel free to comment, as already stated before.
The hood is called \"Hartherz - Kapuze\"

Still, there is no female version or working Inventory models, but I will work on it!

Enjoy ;)


V1.0
-----

So, this is my first mod for an Elder Scrolls mod, I\'m enough satisfied with to upload it.

It adds a Standalone light armor set to the game, which is called \"Hartherz Armor\". Hartherz is a German word, referring to the name of my character. 
The Items have german names, since I\'m from Germany, but this shouldn\'t be a problem. The set contains the \"Hartherz Kampfgewand\" (Hartherz Battle dress), the \"Hartherz Stiefel\" (boots), the \"Hartherz Handschuhe\" (gauntlets) and the \"Hartherz Helm\" (helmet).
The battle dress is a retexture of the mageapprentice robe, the helm is a retextured hide helmet. The boots were iron before and the gauntlets were not even retextured, they look like those from Ulfric Stormcloak.
Since these are different parts you can combine them with other armor sets, if you want.
They can be forged under the category leather and can be also tempered on an armor table.
The stats are somewhere between iron and leather and it\'s classified as light armor.

Since it\'s my first uploaded mod, there may be some issues I didn\'t notice, so you have to tell me ;)

For installation, simply put the files from the \"Hartherz armor\" folder into your Skyrim\\Data directory.

If you like this mod, comment on it, endorse it, or do whatever you want to do else to express your joy
author: RoWar
